name: Banc Media Ltd
tagline: An Agency Where Results Come First.
description:
Our aim at Banc is to serve our clients with passion and integrity, whilst delivering outstanding return on investment through an intelligent, pro-active approach to Organic Search and/or Paid Search Engine Marketing. [Otherwise known as Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) and Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising].
We’re experienced search engine marketeers; results-driven online marketing players; search engine lovers; believers in good usability and intuitive customer journeys; passionate believers in excellent customer service and a company who wants things to be done better for their clients.
